I've been launching runtime workspaces and debugging.  I just tried activating
the console view and the tab changes, the text of the tab changes from Console
to the empty string, but the view contents do not change.  Shortly thereafter I
get an error dialog.  Images forthcoming.

Created an attachment (id=10365)
As described

Also, the text that shows up when you hit the Show button on that dialog is
simply "Error"

I'm encountering similar problems, apparently due to the debug dynamic view
listener not cleaning itself up.  I recently closed the debug perspective and
reopened it.

The first stack above is coming from the console manager.
I see no console in your screen shot.
Or was it under the empty tab at bottom right?
The contents looks like the resource history, which is the previous tab.
Yah, the console is the blank tab...
*** Bug 62028 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Checked CVS. This was due to a part reference with a null part pane. Since this
reported:

1. Part references were refactored such that they never have a null part pane.
2. The findView algorithm is now based in IWorkbenchPartReference and no longer
needs access to the PartPane.

Either one would have fixed this NPE.
